root.title: sudan receiv 50 mln dlr pl480 author
root.body: author purchas 50 mln dlr worth u.s. wheat wheat flour public law 480 issu sudan todai agricultur depart sai author provid 34 mln dlr 309,000 tonn worth wheat grade u.s. number two better except durum shall number three better also provid 16 mln dlr 73,000 tonn worth wheat flour contract period commod march 20 august 31 1987 deliveri period wheat march 20 septemb 30 1987 wheat flour april 10 septemb 30 1987 usda sai
